name: Eyes In The Dark (Saga Gamer Studio)
name_original: Eyes In The Dark (Saga Gamer Studio)
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam week 144, the theme
was "In The Dark".
In this game you will have to find your way back home.
Controls
W A D to move around
PS3 = Left analog moves and X jumps
Keyboard arrows can also be used
Game Engine = Godot Game Engine
